availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Martha A. Armistead. Father of Susan Armistead, George R. Armistead, John Armistead, Sally A. Armistead, and Mary E. Armistead. Brickmason in Ballard County in 1850. Farmer in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Town of Blandsville, p. 277A. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Blandsville, p. 6. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Blandsville, p. 3.
